Articles.Content: I noticed that some people have asked for procedural or adjustable landing gear, but I haven't seen anyone mention @Shadowmage's amazing mod Kerbal Foundries2.  This mod has everything that people have suggested and more. I always used this mod and its dependency KSP Wheel when I played KSP1 with space planes or aircraft contract packs. It would be great if this could be part of the stock KSP2 in the future.  Especially, the feature that aligns the wheel to the ground would be very useful.
